comments.body: A million and one people have dreams of businesses that cuts across real estate and more, there are processes to achieve this even in the event of sourcing for funding for such projects but you are just a noob in this forum, chances are, you can close your account and thats the end of the whole dream.You wouldn't really get it going if you don't have verifiable proof of what has been built and needs to scale.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Firstly, this is a forum for Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies, so does your project have anything to do with Bitcoin? Do you have a plan, for example, to buy and sell real estate using Bitcoin?Second: Investing a group of people in the real estate trade requires the presence of these people in one place so that they can see the properties, examine them, and examine the legal documents related to the properties, so you need partners residing in the same country as you. I do not think that anyone will participate in your investment in real estate while he is in one country and you are in another country.Thirdly, and most importantly, how can people you do not know and who do not know you trust you? Trust is the foundation of the success of any project, basically you don't have anything yet on the ground, so what would make anyone put their money in your hands?

comments.body: This is probably my fifth time seeing more or less similar ideas being discussed. If you're referring to cryptocurrency-based ownership like tokens or Bitcoin-based tokens, I don't think you'll find much success seeing how most of those projects went bankrupt or ditched crypto completely. I'm talking about a company by the way, not some random internet user who crowdfunds from their internet peers. Personally, I don't think you'll find much success seeing your competitors are apps like Robinhood. CMIIW.

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: In investment, what you are trying to offer is known as REITs or Real estate investment trusts (âREITsâ), which is a legally licensed company that takes deposits from citizens in exchange for managing income-generating properties or related assets related to real estate activity, as it buys housing units and gives returns to investors with good profits without Rental complications or related problems.These funds are licensed in countries and have a risk reduction strategy, which makes them better than a number of individuals coming together to buy a residential complex and rent apartments individually.If you have a licensed company, I do not think you will try to advertise here. If you are an individual investor, it is better for you to search for these funds in your country.
